column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The Brussel Sprouts appetizer was a bit disappointing. You mostly just taste the batter and that didn't have much in the way of flavor. As someone else mentioned
column2: it was small cuts of the vegetable which seem to get lost in the batter. You really have to douse them in spice/sauce to enjoy. I'd like to go back and try the other appetizers though.
